about_the_game:
Show the leaderboards you mean business! PGA TOUR 2K25 Clubhouse Pass Premium Season 1 unlocks additional quests, boosts, and the ability to earn valuable items not included in the free track. Progress at your own pace—keep playing through existing Clubhouse Pass Seasons even when a new Season is live!

Add-on content requires base game and Internet connection, and may also require online account registration (minimum age varies), to redeem and use. Base game sold separately. Certain limits apply to purchase, use and redemption. See Terms of Service (ToS) in game and at and for details. For more information on the availability of online features and services visit .
